Communiques/Joint Communique of the 25th ASEAN Labour Ministers Meeting (ALMM) “Promoting Green Jobs for Equity and Inclusive Growth of ASEAN Community”­Joint Communique of the 25th ASEAN Labour Ministers Meeting (ALMM) “Promoting Green Jobs for Equity and Inclusive Growth of ASEAN Community”1. We, the Labour Ministers of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN), met on 28 November 2018 at the 25th ASEAN Labour Ministers Meeting (ALMM) in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Carried the theme “Promoting Green Jobs for Equity and Inclusive Growth of ASEAN Community”, the Meeting was chaired by H.E. M. Kulasegaran, Minister of Human Resources of Malaysia and vice-chaired by H.E. M. Hanif Dhakiri, Minister of Manpower of the Republic of Indonesia.Download the full Joint Communique here.November 28th, 2018|Statement & Communiques|Share This ArticleStatement & "
